text:
The Coroner is hereby designated as Administrative Officer to arrange for the decent interment of veterans and veterans' widows pursuant to the provisions of Division 4, Chapter 5, Article 2 (beginning with Section 940) of the Military and Veterans Code of the State of California. 
(Added by Ord. 124-61, App. 6/1/61; amended by Ord. 70-00, File No. 000357, App. 4/28/2000)
Sec. 2A.220.  RESERVED.
(Added by Ord. 186-99, File No. 990334, App. 7/1/99; amended by Ord. 70-00, File No. 000357, App. 4/28/2000; repealed by Ord. 187-04, File No. 040759, App. 7/22/2004)

heading.title: 2A
heading.catch_text: ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICER FOR VETERANS' INTERMENT DESIGNATED.
